DOC.criteria: Chinese healthy male volunteer determine result screen Written informed consent accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) Age > = 18 < = 40 year Broca > 20 % < + 20 % Any finding medical examination ( blood pressure , pulse rate Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) deviate normal clinical relevance Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder Surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder Chronic relevant acute infection Hypersensitivity Mobic and/or nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug Intake drug within 1 month randomization Participation another trial investigational drug within last 2 month trial Smokers ( > = 10 cigarette > = 3 cigar > = 3 pipes/day ) inability refrain smoke study day Alcohol drug abuse Blood donation within last 1 month Excessive physical activity within last 5 day History hemorrhagic diatheses History gastrointestinal ulcer , perforation bleed History bronchial asthma
